p: The enzyme inhibitory activities of the extracts were calculated as equivalents of the corresponding standard drug per gram of the sample (i.e., galantamine for acetylcholinesterase (AChE) and butyrylcholinesterase (BChE), kojic acid for tyrosinase, orlistat for lipase, and acarbose for α-amylase and α-glucosidase inhibition assays).
